CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 20, 1953, page 22, reads: "Overflow - Courier Newscaster Mal Goode and Assistant Business Manager Russell T. Washington, along with other Home Service Fair personnel distribute samples to the hundreds of persons who were unable to squeeze into the jammed auditorium on the final night."
TitMainTitle: Crowd of women and men gathered outside of Ammon Center for the 1953 Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair
